description:
Eliminate PolyTimeFst axiom
Extract pairEncoding to Encodings.lean to break import cycle. Replace axiom PolyTimeFst in Defs.lean with theorem from PolyTimeFst.lean.

Formalize SAT_in_NP certificate bound
Close the sorry in SAT.lean proving |encode(y)| â‰¤ |encode(formula)|^2.

Formalize reduction transitivity
Implement the proof of reduction transitivity in Defs.lean.

Audit Cook-Levin variable indexing
Audit the indexing formulas in proofs/cook-levin-cnf-blueprint.md for overlap and bijectivity.

Nat bit-length lemmas
Document Mathlib lemmas for Nat.size and binary encoding length in artifacts/nat-encoding-length.md.

Draft Partition to Knapsack reduction
Create proofs/partition-to-knapsack.md.

Verify PARTITION to KNAPSACK reduction
Review proofs/partition-to-knapsack.md. Ensure the pre-check for odd sums is robust and the soundness proof is correct.
